<title level="1" right="Trait">[Unique](/Traits.aspx?ID=723)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup>

A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.
name: Unique
